ResearchProjectDef.label: Neolithic storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build storage containers suitable for a neolithic-era colony with ways of protecting goods from the elements, organizing resources and display weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medieval storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build storage containers suitable for a medieval-era colony with methods of organizing food and resources in a more efficient manner.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Industrial storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build tough storage containers suitable for a industrial-era colony with methods for efficiently storing and organizing large quantities of resources using modern technologies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Spacer storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build advanced storage containers suitable for spacefaring colonies and vessels with methods for efficiently storing and organizing large quantities of resources while using the least amount of space.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Neolithic Storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build simple stone pots that allow you to store some of your resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Complex Storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock a wide range of storage options for all your stuff
